Text.Value: How do I get access to the Murder Tribunal?
What is the Murder Tribunal?
Leave.
Sicarius...
*The corpse remains silent. It does not know.*

EditorData.logicalname: DOESN'T KNOW ANSWER - DELETE IF NOT NEEDED

Text.Value: What proof will the Tribunal require?
The Tribunal... It...
Dolor... A humble servant... A most glorious aspirant...
Who are you?
How does one become an Unholy Assassin?
Why were these targets chosen?
An innocent's hand... To touch divinity...
Speak the word at the door... Bring proof of two sacrifices...
My becoming... Unholy... Assassin...
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
*The corpse regards you lifelessly.*
Why did you kill all those people?
*The corpse tries to speak, but something prevents it.*
Avatar... of... Murder...
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
What word must be spoken?
Prove thyself... Before the Tribunal...
What's an Unholy Assassin?
*The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

Synopsis: When Dolor is Dead, players can talk with him to get more information about the Murder Tribunal.
